content:
Can you provide a sample HTML email template that promotes a new product? The template should include the following elements:
- A header section with a logo and a catchy tagline
- A section showcasing the new product with images and a brief description
- A call-to-action button that leads to a landing page for the product
- A footer section with social media icons and contact information
Please make sure the template is visually appealing and mobile-responsive.
